website_summaries.verdict: A natural makeup brush cleaner suitable for natural and synthetic brushes.
pros: Cleans well and dries quickly after use
cons: Not everyone cares for the scent

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaner that works, however, the fragrance of it is a little strong
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush cleaner. Just spray, wipe with a paper towel and your brush is clean. The only reason why I gave it 4 stars is it has a little bit of fragrance to it that I can smell on the brush after and I'm sensitive to smells.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Vermeulen

customer_reviews.title: Helps prevent acne... SERIOUSLY
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, i was recommended by my esthetician to get it and i use it every time before i apply my foundation. Also every since i have used this stuff i have realized all my acne problems have gone away.. i used to have mild acne and using this on my brush, washing my brush and trying not to touch my face on a daily is a miracle for my face. Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Eli Liuba

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and save money on the brush
customer_reviews.text: Turns just about any similar brush into a suitable substitute for the ridiculously expensive handi brush. Conditions brush fibers very well, and smells great! Seriously, buy this and a cheap brush, save your coin: I bought a "renewal" brush set at Rite Aid and combined with this cleanser/conditioner, it works every bit as good as the Iredale foundation brushes, which are ridiculously expensive.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Clean make up brushes and after using a cloth or paper towel to remove old residue it’s ready to use.
customer_reviews.text: The only cleaner I use to clean my make up brushes red sable or less expensive brush. Spray on brush, and it’s clean dry, and ready to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: smells really good and cleans my brushes very well
customer_reviews.text: smells really good and cleans my brushes very well, also conditions them and leaves them soft. I feel like the super fine spray goes everywhere and wastes a lot of product though. I am going through my bottle much faster than I have with even travel sized cleaner sprays in the past.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Jane Iredale wins again with this brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product to refresh cosmetic brushes between shampoos. It is quick drying and leaves the brushes conditioned and ready to use again. Use often enough to keep your brushes sanitary and clean. Remember, it is not a substitute for regular shampooing, but does allow you to shampoo less often.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredmsg

customer_reviews.title: but good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well! It removes even back eyeshadow from my brushes with no problem, I just spray directly on the brush and swirl on a towel. It smells citrusy, but good!
customer_reviews.author: 4evereva

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my brushes. This does not clean or get ...
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my brushes. This does not clean or get makeup off at all. It does make the brushes greasy while leaving the dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I cannot stand the smell. I used it once ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand the smell. I used it once, and I could not get the smell out of the room.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works ok, but it has a really strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells, great, works great and conditions my Jane Iredale's brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Faithfulbuyseller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite products, I tell all my family and friends about this.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Although the product has a nice scent but does not clean cosmetic brushes as advertised. Very disappointed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know what to say about this product. I absolutely love the Jane Iredale line, especially since it's all natural. I recently found out I have an allergy to gluten, and I didn't realize it, but almost everything has gluten, even cosmetics. The brush cleaner smells nice, but I couldn't really tell a huge difference in how it cleaned my Jane Iredale brushes versus just using water. I guess it conditions the brushes and it is all natural, so that is a benefit, but I didn't see a huge difference in it cleaning them better.
customer_reviews.author: SArchey

product_meta.title: jane iredale Botanical Brush Cleaner, 4 oz.
product_meta.description:
Dissolves the buildup of grime, makeup and oil. Ideal for cleaning natural and synthetic brushes when you don't have time to wash them and wait for them to dry. In a base of quick-drying alcohol and witch hazel, enhanced with grapefruit oil and seaweed extracts.

BRAND STORY
By Jane Iredale

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
